Don’t confuse these values with the service types found in [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/accessory-service-types]. Despite the similarities, they describe different things. # Accessory Category Types

**API Collection**

The accessory category types supported by HomeKit.

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryCategory] instance’s read-only [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryCategory/categoryType] property contains one of the values listed below to tell you what the associated accessory does.

Don’t confuse these values with the service types found in [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/accessory-service-types]. Despite the similarities, they describe different things. Accessories are the physical objects that the user installs in the home, like a garage door opener. Accessories belong to one of the categories listed here, like [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryCategoryTypeGarageDoorOpener].

Accessories have one or more services that perform tasks. The garage door opener accessory has a garage door opener service with service type [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMServiceTypeGarageDoorOpener]. The same accessory might also have an attached light providing a light bulb service with service type [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMServiceTypeLightbulb].

## Light

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeLightbulb**: A lightbulb accessory.

## Power and switches

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeOutlet**: An outlet accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeProgrammableSwitch**: A programmable switch accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeSwitch**: A switch accessory.

## Air quality and smoke detection

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeFan**: A fan accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirPurifier**: An air purifier accessory.

## Temperature and humidity

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeThermostat**: A thermostat accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirConditioner**: An air conditioner accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirDehumidifier**: A dehumidifier accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirHeater**: An air heater accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirHumidifier**: A humidifier accessory.

## Windows

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeWindow**: A window accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeWindowCovering**: A window covering accessory.

## Locks and openers

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeDoor**: A door accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeDoorLock**: A door lock accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeGarageDoorOpener**: A garage door opener accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeVideoDoorbell**: A video doorbell accessory.

## Safety and security

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeSensor**: A sensor accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeSecuritySystem**: A security system accessory.

## Cameras

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeIPCamera**: A networked camera accessory.

## Water

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeSprinkler**: A sprinkler system accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeFaucet**: A faucet accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeShowerHead**: A shower head accessory.

## Network

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeBridge**: A bridge accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeRangeExtender**: A range extender accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAirPort**: An AirPort accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeWiFiRouter**: A WiFi router accessory.

## Audio and sound

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeAudioReceiver**: An audio receiver accessory that supports HAP and AirPlay2.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeSpeaker**: A speaker accessory.

## Television

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeTelevision**: A television accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeTelevisionSetTopBox**: A television set-top box accessory.
- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeTelevisionStreamingStick**: A television streaming stick accessory.

## Uncategorized

- **HMAccessoryCategoryTypeOther**: An uncategorized accessory.

## Reading the category type

- **categoryType**: The category to which this accessory belongs.

title: Accessory Category Types
